Description:
Exception will be throw out if "Dirver class" filed is null during create JDBC data source.

Steps:
1.Create a new JDBC data source
2.Input value in "Database URL","username" and "passwd" filed
3.Click "test connection"

Actual result:
Exception will be throw out

Expected result:
No exception!
Error message will pop up to tell that no suitable driver

Additional info:
I test in build 200606260630.
Please check the attached picture! Thanks!
